title: New synthetic chitosan Schiff bases bearing pyranoquinolinone or benzonaphthyridine and their silver nanoparticles derivatives with potential activity as antioxidant and molecular docking study for EGFR inhibitors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29919-29933
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05117C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shrouk M. Hassan, Jehan M. Morsy, Hany M. Hassanin, Elham S. Othman, Mai A. Mostafa
Two chitosan-based Schiff bases, CS1 and CS2 were synthesized, and they were grafted onto silver nanoparticles, creating CS1/Ag and CS2/Ag structures. They were assessed as antioxidant and EGFR inhibitors.
